body: Should have chapters 3 and 4 of this out within a few days. No updates on the decensor side of things, the guy said he had a couple other tankoubons that he was doing ahead of this one. Whenever he gets that done, I'll re-edit everything onto the decensored art, wherever I'm at in the series. Plan is to eventually have a single gallery with all 6 chapters + the one-shots from the same author that they had compiled into one set; currently we've got Chapter 1+2 of the main series (plus 3 and 4 shortly), and one of the one shots (Natsu's Fault) done, so still some work to be done here!

Lmao ya’ll find the stupidest shit to nitpick. The point of the hentai story is that the onee-San is taking him in because another girl he liked was taken. Let shit be different.
Awh well this was cute, but it would be have been even better if we knew the original love interest better, and if at the end his friend and ex love interest knew that the two were dating.

I don't like where this is going

@spicykestrel Yeah the main title theme is completely irrelevant to what actually happens in the story, though it is still very interesting as is, it could have just been called "I met a random sexy onee-san on my friend's house"

Oh ok I went and checked the original raw tankoubon and the original girl of his interest does appear again for 2 pages casualy on a summer festival, but she does not seem to really be a important part of the story at all, it's really just a nice vanilla with some later troubles in between, looking forwards to the upcoming chaps being translated
@nhcasual - I think she shows up again briefly in chapter 4 but yeah basically there's not much point to her existence lmao, definitely a weird plot point to base the title around

Well this is neat and all that but what was even the point of the black haired girl he liked to be even in this story? It's not like she ever even appears again, this may as well just have been a normal wholesome vanilla and not much would have changed, still very nice though
And we're back with chapter 2! Nice wholesome vanilla content. Already working on chapter 3, and decensor to come eventually (supposedly)!
